articles.title: Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold 7 Is A Winner, Except For Two Things
articles.author: Mitch Wallace
articles.summary: Samsung has released the Galaxy Z Fold 7, a foldable flagship smartphone featuring a large 8-inch inner display, a 200MP outer camera, and a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite processor. The phone offers multitasking capabilities, allowing users to run up to three apps simultaneously. The 256 GB model retails for $1,999.99, with higher storage options available at increased prices.

articles.title: Sandisk unveils storage drive for creators
articles.author: Justice Okamgba
articles.summary: SanDisk launched the WD Blue SN5100 SSD, a high-speed storage drive aimed at creators and professionals. The new SSD is up to 30 per cent faster than previous models, with storage sizes from 500GB to 4TB and includes a five-year warranty, designed to speed up tasks like video editing and large file transfers.

articles.title: Launch Dominator Unveiled: AI-Powered Launch Jacking Software Automates Affiliate Content for Product Launches
articles.author: Getnews
articles.summary: Launch Dominator, an AI-powered platform by LaunchJack Dominator, is now available globally to help affiliate marketers generate SEO-optimized content for product launches. The platform streamlines campaign preparation by providing AI-driven content generation, search optimization features, and affiliate-ready campaign tools, which enables users to create reviews, comparisons, and campaign materials quickly.

articles.title: M&S makes major change to store shelves and it's good news for shoppers
articles.author: Celine Marshall
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer (M&S) has introduced new food items in its Foodhalls, including a Chicken Tikka Sandwich, Butter Chicken Wrap, and two new bagels, including a New York deli-style bagel. M&S has also released a new version of its Colin the Caterpillar Cake, called Arctic Colin, to mark the dessert's 35th birthday.

articles.title: Harry's unveils ‘most advanced' shaving range Plus
articles.author: Daniel Selwood
articles.summary: Harry's has launched Harry's Plus, a new line of razors featuring a breakthrough pivoting system for a closer, smoother shave. The razors boast a sleek, matte-metal handle and a compact blade cartridge designed to reduce irritation and improve maneuverability. This launch represents a decade-long pursuit of the perfect shave for the company.

articles.title: Save Up To 38% During Labor Day Washer And Dryer Sales
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: LG, Samsung, GE, and Whirlpool are offering significant discounts on their top-rated washing machines and dryers during Labor Day sales events. Consumers can save hundreds of dollars on these appliances.

articles.title: This best-selling smart sprinkler system is over $60 off for Labor Day
articles.author: Christine Persaud
articles.summary: Tineco Floor One S5 Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop is on sale at Amazon. Roborock Q5 DuoRoller+ Robot Vacuum has double rollers for improved performance and is available at Walmart. Drew Barrymore's Beautiful 10-in-1, 6-Quart Electric Multi-Cooker is on sale at Walmart. The Nike Aura Backpack is on sale and available in range of colors.

articles.title: Princess Madeleine of Sweden shares personal message as she begins new chapter
articles.author: Natalie Oliveri
articles.summary: Princess Madeleine, in collaboration with Weleda, has launched a new skincare line called 'minLen,' targeting children and babies. The product range includes face creams, shampoo, conditioner, body wash, serums, body oil, and lip balm, currently available in Switzerland and Germany with plans for global expansion.

articles.title: As Long As You're Already Scrolling Through Amazon, Might As Well Pick Up A Car
articles.summary: Ken Garff Hyundai in Cheyenne launched its entire inventory on Amazon Autos, an online sales platform. Stevenson Hyundai in Frederick, Colorado, also listed cars on the platform. Hertz Car Rental has signed up to sell its used vehicles through Amazon Autos, starting in metropolitan areas.

articles.title: 29 Must-Have Target Baby Products For Daily Use
articles.author: John Mihaly
articles.summary: The article showcases a variety of new and existing products designed to simplify parenthood. Among these are the Baby Brezza Formula Pro Mini for quick formula preparation, and the NutriBullet baby food prep system for making homemade baby food.

articles.title: Look out, Meta Ray-Bans! These AI glasses just raised over $1M in pre-orders in 3 days
articles.author: Jason Hiner
articles.summary: Rokid launched Rokid Glasses via a Kickstarter campaign on August 26, quickly raising over $1 million in pre-orders within 72 hours. These smart glasses combine features like photography, audio, and an AI assistant with a head-up display, offering upgrades such as broader language support, horizontal/vertical photo mode, larger battery, ChatGPT integration, Audio Memo, and magnetized lenses compared to Meta Ray-Bans.

articles.title: The 7 Best AI Video Generators to Use in 2025
articles.author: Ameyaw Debrah
articles.summary: The article introduces seven AI video generators: TopView, DeepBrain, Sora, Runway, InVideo, Lumen5, and Synthesia. These tools cater to various needs, from e-commerce product videos (TopView) and training materials (DeepBrain) to cinematic content (Sora, Runway) and automated script-to-video creation (InVideo, Lumen5, Synthesia). Each offers unique features and pricing plans, aiming to simplify and accelerate video production for diverse use cases.

articles.title: One ASX pure-play takes aim at Agentic AI
articles.author: Eddy Sunarto
articles.summary: Decidr AI Industries (ASX:DAI) has launched DecidrOS, a platform designed to implement agentic AI in daily business practices. DecidrOS builds a digital twin of the business and integrates agents that can run real workflows without coding, targeting marketing, HR, and admin areas.

articles.title: Flume Launches Dedicated Innovation Department
articles.author: SAT Articles
articles.summary: Flume, a digital marketing agency, has launched its Innovation Department. This new division focuses on providing clients with forward-thinking strategies, proactive idea generation, trend analysis, and technology research and development, aiming to keep clients ahead in the digital space.

articles.title: 50 Products With Before And Afters So Shocking You'll Have To Pick Your Jaw Up Off The Floor ~Repeatedly~
articles.author: Jessica Hall
articles.summary: Cosrx introduces Acne Pimple Master Patches designed to reduce the appearance and pain of pimples. Blume launches meltdown acne oil, a product aimed at combating acne-prone skin while providing moisturization, suitable for sensitive skin and can be worn under makeup. Paula's Choice has launched a liquid exfoliant, a non-abrasive, leave-on exfoliant designed to unclog and diminish enlarged pores, loosen dead skin cells, and brighten and even out skin tone.

articles.title: Custom Domain Email: Take Back Control & Look Pro!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Fastmail, Proton Mail, Zoho, Google Workspace and iCloud Mail provide services that support custom email domains, allowing users to have more control, enhanced security, and branding. These providers offer seamless switching between them by pointing the domain to a new provider without address changes. Additionally, Fastmail offers 'catch-all' aliases for improved inbox management and spam protection.

articles.title: Samsung Launches Galaxy A17 5G
articles.author: Dc Correspondent
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy A17 5G in India. This phone features AI capabilities like Circle to Search and Gemini Live, along with a new on-device Voice Mail. Available in blue, grey, and black, it has a 6.7-inch screen, triple-lens camera, 5000mAh battery, and expandable storage up to 2TB, with prices ranging from Rs 18,999 to Rs 23,499 depending on the storage variant.

articles.title: Roanoke firefighters work to restore ‘Grey Ghost,' a 1950s era fire truck built in Roanoke
articles.summary: Amazon curates a 'new releases page' featuring some of the hottest products going on sale within the last seven days on its online marketplace, implying new products or services are being introduced.

articles.title: Labor Day Facts
articles.author: Trent Gilbreath
articles.summary: Amazon curates the hottest products on sale in the last seven days on its new releases page. This online marketplace feature highlights recently added products.

articles.title: Wildlife Photographer of the Year
articles.author: Trent Gilbreath
articles.summary: Amazon curates a 'new releases' page on its online marketplace. This page features some of the most popular products that have gone on sale in the last seven days.

articles.title: Nvidia's Blackwell GPUs move robotics into the physical AI era
articles.author: Tech Spot
articles.summary: Nvidia launched the Jetson AGX Thor platform, incorporating their latest Blackwell GPU architecture. This new hardware platform is designed for both industrial and consumer robotics applications, representing a significant step forward in Nvidia's robotics-focused offerings.

articles.title: GP Batteries Partners with GPTBots to Build a Global Intelligent Customer Service Network  Sep. 1, 2025 18:30
articles.summary: GP Batteries, in partnership with GPTBots.ai, launched an AI-powered customer service system, named "Battery Advisor" and "Global Customer Service Ambassador". The AI system recommends battery models, answers FAQs, and provides location-based purchase suggestions in multiple languages. Implemented on GP Batteries' official website and social media, the system has decreased customer service workload by over 50% and significantly improved customer satisfaction.

articles.title: How AI Ad Generators Are Changing the Game
articles.author: Staff Reporter
articles.summary: Pippit, an AI ad generator, is introduced as a tool that simplifies ad creation and boosts engagement. It creates personalized and optimized ads for platforms like Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok. The tool helps businesses create professional, high-converting ads quickly and efficiently, offering features like video editing, content repurposing, and resizing.

articles.title: 'Who Are You'? And 'How Can You Pay'? The Keys To Agentic Commerce
articles.author: David G.W. Birch
articles.summary: Worldpay, in collaboration with Trulioo, is developing a "Digital Agent Passport" (DAP) framework. This new service will enable merchants to verify AI agents in agentic commerce, ensuring they are legitimate, authorized, and acting with proper consent. The initiative aims to support merchants in exploiting the new opportunities presented by agentic commerce.

articles.title: GPTBots.ai Partners with GP Batteries to Build a Global Intelligent Customer Service Network  Sep. 1, 2025 18:00
articles.summary: Aurora Mobile's AI agent platform, GPTBots.ai, has partnered with GP Batteries to launch an AI-powered customer service system. This system, which includes a 'Battery Advisor' and 'Global Customer Service Ambassador', has improved customer service efficiency and reduced operating costs for GP Batteries.

articles.title: Parents, listen up! We found Labor Day Amazon deals on baby essentials, starting at $4
articles.author: Danielle Murphy
articles.summary: Several baby products are highlighted, including wash cloths made of 100% cotton designed to soften with each wash, and a mini sound machine with 30 soothing sounds and timer settings.  Multiple strollers are mentioned, such as the Baby Trend Expedition Jogger with all-terrain bicycle tires, and various car seats with adjustable features and safety designs are available, some with discounts for Labor Day.

articles.title: The LYCRA Company Goes "ALL IN" at Intertextile Shanghai
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: The LYCRA Company showcased several new product innovations at Intertextile Shanghai, including LYCRA VintageFX denim technology, Bio-derived LYCRA EcoMade fiber, LYCRA FitSense denim technology, COOLMAX EcoMade fiber, and THERMOLITE EcoMade fiber. These innovations highlight the company's commitment to providing advanced fiber solutions and enhancing product capabilities for their partners.

articles.title: 29 Totally Responsible Purchases That'll Make You Feel Exceptionally 'Adult'
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: Several new products and services are introduced: a WD-40 pen for precise lubrication, aligner cleaner foam for oral hygiene, a microchip pet feeder for controlled pet feeding, embroidered Hoka Cliftons merge podiatrist recommendations with personal style.  These products provide innovative solutions for everyday needs, offering convenience and addressing specific problems.

articles.title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Unveiled with Official Launch Date and Pricing Details
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Team Cherry has announced the launch date for Hollow Knight: Silksong as September 19th, 2025. The game will be available on PC (Steam), Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4/5, and Xbox One/Series X|S for $29.99 USD, with pre-orders now live and digital deluxe editions available for $39.99. Silksong introduces a new protagonist, Hornet, and a vast new kingdom to explore, along with new combat mechanics and features.

articles.title: Eureka Brings Exclusive Deals to TikTok Shop Super Brand Club
articles.summary: Eureka, a home cleaning brand, is launching exclusive offers on its NEW400 cordless wet-dry vacuum during TikTok Shop's Super Brand Club from September 8 to 14. Shoppers can enjoy up to 30% off on the NEW400, which has become a popular product on TikTok Shop since its launch.

articles.title: 35 Beauty Products Under $25 That'll Cast Some Serious Spells On Your Hair, Skin, And Nails
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: LilyAna Naturals offers retinol cream to support collagen production and combat uneven skin tone. Gold Bond introduces firming neck and chest cream to improve skin's firmness and elasticity. I Dew Care presents dry shampoo powder with biotin and black ginseng to add volume to hair.

articles.title: Eureka Brings Exclusive Deals to TikTok Shop Super Brand Club
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Eureka is introducing its NEW400 cordless wet-dry vacuum to TikTok Shop's Super Brand Club. The NEW400, launched recently, offers powerful suction, vacuuming, and mopping capabilities, and has become a top seller on TikTok Shop, with over 3,000 units sold monthly. During the event, shoppers can get up to 30% off.

articles.title: Behind the Wacky History of Häagen-Dazs, from a Horse-Drawn Cart to Its Misleading Name
articles.author: Victoria Edel
articles.summary: Häagen-Dazs was founded by Reuben and Rose Mattus, who launched their ice cream business in 1960 with a focus on high-quality ingredients and a pseudo-European brand image. They started with chocolate, vanilla, and coffee flavors, and Rose personally promoted the product in New York. In 2023, General Mills launched a limited edition vanilla pint to honor Rose Mattus's contributions.

articles.title: Gafeetha Santon's Journey: From drug addiction to business success
articles.author: Genevieve  Serra
articles.summary: Gafeetha Santon is an entrepreneur who promotes Diamond Liquid Gel, an all-purpose washing powder. She uses social media and attends markets to promote the product with the aim to take it across South Africa. Diamond Liquid Gel is currently her only source of income.

articles.title: Eureka Brings Exclusive Deals to TikTok Shop Super Brand Club
articles.author: Eureka
articles.summary: Eureka, a home cleaning brand, is joining TikTok Shop's Super Brand Club. They will offer exclusive deals on their products, including the newly launched NEW400 cordless wet-dry vacuum, from September 8 to 14.

articles.title: 5 ChatGPT Prompts To Grow Beyond A Plateau: Find Your Second Unlock
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: ChatGPT provides prompts designed to assist businesses in discovering and implementing secondary marketing channels. The service aims to facilitate significant growth beyond current levels.

articles.title: Frizerly Launches AI-Powered SEO Blogging Platform to Help Businesses Rank Higher on Google
articles.summary: Frizerly has launched its AI-powered SEO blogging solution, designed to act as an AI marketing manager. It automatically publishes AI SEO blogs to improve search engine visibility, attract customers, and increase sales for businesses. The platform integrates with website builders like Shopify and WordPress.

articles.title: Lulu: Print-on-Demand for Global Publishing
articles.author: Mazi
articles.summary: Lulu provides a self-publishing platform with print-on-demand and global distribution services. It enables creators to transform content into physical and digital books without needing inventory. Lulu allows printing books as needed and distributing them to major online retailers like Amazon and Barnes & Noble.

articles.title: 32 Walmart Products To Crush Your To-Do List
articles.author: John Mihaly
articles.summary: The article highlights a range of recently available products for home and personal use. Featured items include a Roomba Wi-Fi robot vacuum for automated floor cleaning, an Arlo video doorbell for remote door monitoring, and a Chefman Turbofry air fryer for quick cooking. Additionally, the article mentions the Fasta Pasta microwave cooker as new product for minimal mess pasta, and a 2-in-1 foldable under-desk treadmill.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy A17 with 50MP camera, 5,000 mAh battery launched in India: Price, specs and more
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy A17 smartphone in India, featuring an Exynos chipset, FHD+ display, and a 50MP main camera. The Galaxy A17 5G is available in three colors and storage variants, starting at Rs 18999, and includes AI features like Circle to Search and Gemini Live.

articles.title: JONR to Debut Annual Flagship Robot Vacuum X1 Max at IFA 2025
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: JONR will launch its annual flagship robot vacuum, the X1 Max, at IFA 2025 in Berlin. The X1 Max features a tangle-free system, extendable mopping brushes, and AI obstacle avoidance. It will be available for pre-order on Amazon in Germany, France, Italy, and Spain starting September 5.

articles.title: Foundersbase Launches Social Network to End 'Swipe-Right' Era for Co-Founder Searching
articles.author: Foundersbase
articles.summary: Foundersbase launched its platform in the United States, providing an alternative to swipe-based co-founder matching apps. The platform includes features such as open networking, a startup job board, and smart discovery, aiming to connect entrepreneurs with collaborators, talent, and investors. Foundersbase is targeting founders and early-stage startup teams with the launch.

articles.title: JONR to Debut Annual Flagship Robot Vacuum X1 Max at IFA 2025
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: JONR, an intelligent cleaning solutions brand, will launch its annual flagship robot vacuum, the X1 Max, at IFA 2025 in Berlin.

articles.title: 苹果XR拍的，三年前… 主要是用手机的那个人喜欢调来调去，咱随便拍张就很满足了！
articles.summary: Apple XR is mentioned, with one user stating they had not heard of it and another mentioning their son used it previously. It is identified as the version after the iPhone 8.

articles.title: Samsung Launches New TV With Aesthetics
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Nigeria launched a new, innovative QLED television at the Nike Art Gallery in Lekki, Lagos. The television functions as a piece of art when switched off.

articles.title: Nest brings over 50 thousand new products in technology!
articles.summary: Nest.com has expanded its online platform by introducing over 50,000 new technology products, including laptops, televisions, cameras, keyboards, and headphones. The platform aims to provide easy access to sought-after products with competitive prices and offers free shipping with DHL.

articles.title: Pricing Is A Product, And It's More Strategic Than You Think
articles.author: Chris Kent
articles.summary: Metronome offers a solution to treat pricing as a first-class product, enabling teams to implement monetization strategies faster and align pricing with value delivery. This infrastructure allows for observable, flexible, and scalable pricing, ultimately empowering customers with transparent, usage-based experiences.

articles.title: The ghd trade in is back: Here's how you can save £100 on the Chronos and Chronos Max hair straightener's
articles.author: Natalie Dixon
articles.summary: ghd launched the Chronos straightener and is offering a trade-in program for customers in the UK and Ireland until March 31, 2025, providing a £100 discount for old ghd straighteners traded in. SmilePro Advanced Whitening Kit offers at-home teeth whitening and 47 Skin launched Anti-Blemish & Scar Repair Serum for acne treatment.

articles.title: SPKTRL AI Ring Blends AI Tech with Luxury Design
articles.author: Technowize Magazine
articles.summary: SPKTRL has launched the SPKTRL AI ring. The AI ring is a wearable tech expected to change user interactions.

articles.title: Dayton manufacturer partners with Atlanta recycler on new can ends
articles.author: Thomas Gnau
articles.summary: Novelis, in partnership with DRT Holdings, is developing a 'unialloy' design for aluminum beverage can ends to be made from up to 99% recycled content. This collaboration aims to optimize the design and sustainability of can ends, using the same alloy as the can body.

articles.title: 9/1/2025: More clouds, but still nice for Labor Day
articles.author: Matt Mackie
articles.summary: Amazon has introduced a new releases page on its online marketplace. This page curates and showcases popular products that have gone on sale within the last seven days.

articles.title: Silksong Announces Affordable Pricing and Launch Dates Details
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: Team Cherry is launching Hollow Knight: Silksong on PC (Steam, GOG, Epic Games Store), Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X/S & Xbox One, and PlayStation 5 & PlayStation 4, priced at $14.99 USD / €14.99 / £12.99. The game introduces a new protagonist, Hornet, along with over 150 new enemies and silk-based abilities.

articles.title: 53 Cheap Swaps For More Expensive Products
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Various companies are introducing affordable alternatives to popular beauty and fashion products.  These include E.l.f.'s Sheer For It Blush Tint as an alternative to Benetint,  L'Oreal Paris Infallible 3-Second Setting Spray Mist comparable to One/Size setting spray, and Essence's Drop of Sunshine Bronzing Drops as an alternative to Drunk Elephant's version, offering similar benefits at lower prices.

articles.title: 'I'm On My Fourth Bottle': 34 Korean Beauty Products That Are So Good You Might Shed A Tear When They Run Out
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: Customers are highly satisfied with the sunscreen product, praising its smooth application, lack of white cast on darker skin tones, and skin-softening effects. Some users report improved skin glow and fading of dark spots with regular use. The product is also noted to be suitable for sensitive skin.

articles.title: Morrisons introduces major new service to 53 UK stores - full list
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: A new service will provide shoppers with greater flexibility and convenience.

articles.title: My honest review of the Lookfantastic beauty advent calendar
articles.author: Lifestyle Writer
articles.summary: Lookfantastic is launching its 2025 Beauty Advent Calendar, which includes 28 products (17 full-size) from luxury brands like Mac, Aveda, and REN, worth over £655 for a price of £105. Pre-orders are now open and will be dispatched on September 16th.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold vs. Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7: Here's the clear winner ...
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Samsung and Google are releasing new foldable devices targeting different user types. The article aims to help consumers choose the right device for their needs.

articles.title: Revamping Software Sales: The SoftwareFloor Revolution
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: SoftwareFloor.com launched a platform that connects software vendors with businesses actively searching for solutions. The platform leverages AI-driven recommendations and provides affordable lead generation opportunities. It fosters trust through verified user reviews and comparisons.

articles.title: How SoftwareFloor is Helping Software Vendors to Get Business Leads at Affordable Rates
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: SoftwareFloor.com offers a marketplace where software vendors can showcase their products to a targeted audience, offering an affordable lead generation model. The platform leverages AI-driven recommendation tools and user reviews to connect buyers with suitable software solutions.

articles.title: LG Unveils Revolutionary Xd2 Dishwasher – Set to Sparkle, Sanitize, and Reclaim Your Time
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: LG Electronics (LG) announced the launch of its advanced XD2 Dishwasher.

articles.title: Samsung tri-fold video leak shows how neatly it'll fold away
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to launch the Galaxy Z TriFold, a tri-fold phone, potentially at IFA 2025. The phone is expected to fold from the left, layering up the three panes and using a different folding mechanism than the Z fold design. The launch could also be strategically timed to coincide with or precede Apple's iPhone event.

articles.title: Best Dyson stick vacuums for lightweight and cordless convenience
articles.author: Best Reviews
articles.summary: Dyson offers a range of stick vacuums, including the Dyson V15 Detect Cordless Vacuum Cleaner with dust detection technology and the Dyson Gen5outsize Absolute vacuum with up to 140 minutes of runtime. The V15 Detect includes two cleaner heads, while the Gen5outsize is designed for whole-home cleaning with three power modes and an LCD screen.

articles.title: Pacdora to offer AI-powered solutions to streamline packaging design
articles.author: Global Data
articles.summary: Pacdora is launching a comprehensive AI-powered solution for design and marketing to transform the packaging creation process. The new solution allows users to upload product photos and instantly receive photorealistic, style-matched background suggestions using AI background generator technology, and offers text-to-image capabilities powered by advanced 3D rendering technology and OpenAI's GPT-4.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold vs. Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7: Here's the clear winner after testing both
articles.author: Prakhar Khanna
articles.summary: Google has released the Pixel 10 Pro Fold, a new book-style foldable phone with an IP68 rating for dust resistance. This feature is a first for foldable phones. The Pixel 10 Pro Fold is presented as a strong competitor to the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, particularly for users in dust-prone environments or those switching from an iPhone.

articles.title: 33 Problem-Solving Hidden Gems On Amazon To Peruse
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: The article presents a variety of new products, from the 'No Makeup Makeup cream-balm foundation', a 3-in-1 color corrector, concealer, and foundation, to 'Swizzle Stick', an absorbent post-sex sponge designed to manage fluids. Furthermore, the article introduces the electric spin scrubber, Scrub Mommy and Scrub Daddy, a motorized cleaning tool, and Brushies silicone baby toothbrushes, a friend-shaped finger brushes with book.

articles.title: NIO Inc. Achieved 31,305 Vehicle Deliveries in August 2025
articles.author: NIO Inc.
org: The Stock Exchange of Hong Kong Limited
articles.summary: NIO Inc. announced its August 2025 delivery results, which include 31,305 vehicles. The deliveries consisted of 10,525 NIO vehicles, 16,434 ONVO vehicles, and 4,346 FIREFLY vehicles. Cumulative deliveries reached 838,036 as of August 31, 2025.

articles.title: Audi's Coupe Concept Accidentally Revealed Before Anyone Was Supposed To See It
articles.author: Carscoops
articles.summary: Audi plans to unveil an all-new sports car at the Munich Motor Show. A concept image of the sports coupe was briefly released by Audi of Canada.

articles.title: LG BRINGS SEAMLESS, EVOLVING SMART HOME EXPERIENCES TO EUROPE WITH THINQ AI  Sep. 1, 2025 09:00
articles.summary: LG Electronics is launching its AI platform, LG ThinQ AI, in the European smart home appliance market. The platform integrates ThinQ UP and ThinQ Care services to offer personalized upgrades and proactive appliance management with features like AI Saving Mode for refrigerators. LG plans a steady release of region-specific ThinQ UP features, with the European rollout in September.

articles.title: LG Unveils Revolutionary Xd2 Dishwasher – Set to Sparkle, Sanitize, and Reclaim Your Time
articles.summary: LG Electronics has launched its new XD2 Dishwasher in the Gulf region. The dishwasher features 100°C TrueSteam technology, QuadWash, 1 Hour Wash & Dry cycle with Dynamic Heat Dry, EasyRack™ Plus, ThinQ connectivity, and Inverter DirectDrive™ technology, focusing on enhanced hygiene, faster cleaning, and user convenience.

articles.title: Poco C85 launches with Helio G81 Ultra chip and 6000mAh battery
articles.author: Rajesh
articles.summary: Poco has launched its new entry-level smartphone, the Poco C85, featuring a 6.9-inch display, MediaTek Helio G81 Ultra chip, and a 6000mAh battery with 33W fast charging. The phone starts at $109 for the 6GB/128GB model.

articles.title: Cuzor Pulse GaN charger review: Made-In-India to global standards
articles.summary: Cuzor has launched the Cuzor Pulse, a 70W GaN charger designed and built in India. The charger features two USB-C ports, supports fast charging protocols like Power Delivery and Qualcomm's Quick Charge, and claims optimized charging for MacBooks. It is priced at Rs 2500 (selling price) and stands out due to its effective heat management during fast charging.

articles.title: Samsung raises aesthetics demand of customers with new product launch
articles.author: Business Day
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Nigeria has introduced a new QLED television, known as "The Frame," to meet customer aesthetic demands. The TV features exceptional aesthetic designs, allowing customers to transform their TVs into framed art.

articles.title: Shinil Electronics announced on the 1st that it will launch a new product called "food processor" (p..
articles.author: Lee Yu-Jin
articles.summary: Shinil Electronics is launching a new food processor with a 2.5-liter capacity that can dry and pulverize food at high temperatures using a quadruple blade. The product, launching on Wadiz, features a low-noise DC motor, double activated carbon filter, and three operational modes (automatic, rapid, and cleaning) with LED display.

articles.title: Samsung's One UI 8 update lands this month and it's loaded with next-level AI tools
articles.author: David Snelling
articles.summary: Samsung is launching its new operating system, One UI 8, which comes pre-installed on Galaxy Z Flip7 and ZFold 7 and is being rolled out to the Galaxy S25 series in September. One UI 8 brings intelligent upgrades and enhanced smart capabilities like Audio Eraser. Samsung also announced the launch of a new device on September 4.

articles.title: Domino's Pizza announced on the 1st that its signature menu "Black Tiger Shrimp" (Blotash) and its n..
articles.author: A Whimsical Lake
articles.summary: Domino's Pizza is experiencing high popularity among the MZ generation for its "Black Tiger Shrimp" pizza and the new 35th-anniversary product, "Lobster Shrimp Toomba." Responding to customer demand, Domino's Pizza launched "Burning Rabshutu," a new version of "Lobster Shrimp Toomba" with a spicy and sweet flavor profile.

articles.title: McDonald's launches new McCrispy Burger — and 36,000 are free, Lifestyle News
articles.summary: McDonald's launched the McCrispy Burger on September 1st, featuring a chicken thigh patty with smoky sauce and lettuce. On September 4th, they introduced Crinkle Cut Fries with onion cheese flavor and Yuzu McFizz. From September 18th, McDonald's will launch McPops in two flavors and the Yuan Yang Latte.

articles.title: TDK Unveils New Brand Identity and Tagline: 'In Everything, Better' (TDK Corporation)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: TDK has introduced a new brand identity and tagline, "In Everything, Better." This reflects TDK's core values and their contributions to culture, industry, and society.

articles.title: MKS to participate in SEMICON Taiwan 2025 (Atotech Ltd)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: MKS Inc. will showcase its full range of solutions tailored to the diverse needs of next-generation technologies.

articles.title: Aldi shoppers rave about ‘best hairdryer ever' – it's £267 cheaper than a Dyson but you'll have to be quick to get it
articles.author: Senior Digital Writer
articles.summary: Aldi has launched the Ambiano Ionic Hairdryer, priced at £12.99, which includes multiple heat and speed settings, a cool shot function, overheat protection, and concentrator and diffuser attachments. The hairdryer is available in multiple colours and is being marketed as a budget-friendly alternative to more expensive models like the Dyson Supersonic Origin Hair Dryer.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy owners are about to get a huge free update packed with new features
articles.author: David Snelling
articles.summary: Samsung is launching its new operating system, One UI 8, starting with the Galaxy S25 series in September. The update includes AI-powered features and a refined look, with upgrades such as Audio Eraser for video background noise removal. Other Galaxy devices like the S24 and S23 will also receive the update later.

articles.title: 第一时间下单的首批Model Y L准车主，即将提走爱车！_手机网易网
articles.author: 特斯拉
articles.summary: Early purchasers of the Model Y L are preparing to take delivery of their vehicles. This Model Y L provides all-around driving experience. Potential customers are encouraged to visit stores to experience the Model Y L.

articles.title: Bedding brand Alermann announced on the 1st that it has unveiled a new product lineup that combines ..
articles.author: Seo Jung-Won
articles.summary: Alermann has launched a new product lineup for the F/W 2025 season, featuring hotel-style designs and advanced functional materials. Key products include bedding sets like 'Delis,' 'Lakrowa,' 'Verita,' 'Arnelly,' and 'Prié,' as well as new semi-unsealed vegan goose assorted sets 'Prado' and 'Greenwich,' made with eco-friendly materials and allergy-blocking fabric.

articles.title: McDonald's Singapore to give away 36k McCrispy burgers on Sept 4
articles.summary: McDonald's Singapore is launching new menu items, including the McCrispy chicken burger, onion cheese flavored crinkle-cut fries, and a Yuzu McFizz drink on September 4th. On September 18th, they will add a Yuan Yang latte and McPops doughnuts to the menu.

articles.title: The Future of Digital Marketing: SEO vs AI Marketing (and Why SEO Still Wins)
articles.author: General Editor
articles.summary: SiteMile provides top-notch SEO services and delivers WordPress and custom app solutions to help businesses improve SEO while making growth sustainable. They offer custom WordPress development, web app builds, and solutions designed to keep businesses competitive in search rankings and user experience.

articles.title: 30 Sensible Walmart Items For People In Their Thirties
articles.author: Lucia Peters
articles.summary: The article highlights various products that are beneficial for people in their 30s. It includes a three-pack of period-friendly underwear from Hanes that provides extra protection from leaks, Holy Hydration! facial moisturizer from e.l.f. for moisturizing skin and lightweight, mineral-based sunscreen from Cetaphil for sun protection. The article also presents a cordless vacuum from Shark designed for pet hair on both carpet and hardwood.

articles.title: Unlock Startup Success with a Mobile App Redesign by Wavespace
articles.summary: Wavespace provides mobile app redesign services to startups, focusing on improving usability, retention, and credibility. Their user-centered design approach ensures consistent design language and quick delivery of concepts, aiming to transform outdated apps into growth engines.

articles.title: BAT Rothmans announced on the 1st that it has fully applied "StickSeal technology" that enhances man..
articles.author: Choi Ki-Sung
articles.summary: BAT Rothmans has introduced 'StickSeal technology' to all 10 types of its Neo series tobacco sticks for the Glo Hyper device, enhancing user convenience by preventing residue and maintaining device cleanliness. Furthermore, the 'Tobacco Switch' product has been renewed, offering a unique soft tobacco taste with a cooling sensation. The Neo series is available nationwide at major convenience stores and tobacco retailers.

articles.title: Lazada Launches LazMom, Mother And Baby Special Channel, Guarantees Product Authenticity
articles.summary: Lazada Indonesia has launched LazMom, a dedicated channel within its application catering to mothers' and babies' needs, ensuring easy, affordable, and original product access.  Complementing this, Lazada introduces the Prosperous Susu Guarantee Program on LazMom, partnering with trusted milk brands and providing refunds or replacements for damaged or misrepresented formula milk products.

articles.title: Samsung launches Galaxy A17 5G in Nepal
articles.author: THT Online
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy A17 5G smartphone in Nepal. The phone features AI-driven capabilities like Gemini integration and Circle to Search, a 50MP OIS camera, and a 6.7-inch Super AMOLED display. It is available in three variants, ranging in price from Rs. 28,999 to Rs. 34,999.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Smoothie King introduces food options in Middletown
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: Smoothie King is launching its first-ever food menu at various locations in New Jersey, including Middletown. Starting September 2nd, customers can enjoy new items like avocado toast and protein boxes, enhancing their smoothie experience.

articles.title: Dry your wet washing in a flash with Aldi's space-saving gadget & it means you can ditch tumble dryer & save on bills
articles.author: Harvey Geh
articles.summary: Aldi is selling the Addis Tier Airer for £14.99. This space-saving drying device boasts three tiers, a 15kg capacity, locking clips, and easy-glide feet. The airer is available in black and grey and is in stores until September 4.

articles.title: Next's new £45 'flattering' jeans shoppers 'wear all the time' because 'they fit beautifully'
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: Next launched its new Dart Detail Barrel Jeans priced at £45. These jeans feature a unique arched leg shape and dart detailing, available in rinse blue and black colors, and various sizes. Made from 100% cotton, the jeans have received positive customer feedback regarding their fit and quality.

articles.title: Body care from first drop to last touch
articles.summary: Watsons is promoting a holistic approach to bath time with a range of products for pre, during, and post-shower routines. The company is also hosting an event on September 5 at MOA 7 Storefront where customers can discover these products and receive self-care tips.

articles.title: Houston Natural Mattress Debuts the Avocado Grand Luxe, Reinforcing Role as Best Luxury Mattress Store in Houston, TX
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Houston Natural Mattress is now offering the Avocado Grand Luxe mattress by Avocado Green in its Houston showroom. This ultra-luxury mattress is handcrafted with premium materials like silk, alpaca, mohair, and fine wool. It is available for customers to test and compare with other luxury mattresses.

articles.title: Affordable SEO Services in Ghaziabad ~ Local & Global SEO Experts
articles.summary: The Digital Curve offers affordable SEO services in Ghaziabad, including local and global SEO solutions. These services aim to improve Google rankings, increase organic traffic, and drive quality leads through keyword research, on-page and off-page SEO, content optimization, and link building.

articles.title: McDonald's Singapore launches new McCrispy burger; customers can get them free at stores on Sept 4
articles.author: Gabrielle Andres
articles.summary: McDonald's Singapore is launching new menu items for a limited time, including the McCrispy burger featuring a crispy chicken thigh patty and smoky sauce, onion cheese flavored crinkle-cut fries, and a Yuzu McFizz drink. Additionally, on September 18th, McDonald's will introduce a Yuan Yang latte and choco-hazelnut and berry McPops doughnuts to the menu.

articles.title: LF announced on the 1st that it held the first "2025 Generative AI Business Innovation Challenge" fo..
articles.author: Kim Hyejin
articles.summary: LF held the "2025 Generative AI Business Innovation Challenge", developing an in-house data search system based on images and keywords. The system speeds up strategy establishment when planning new products. LF's Hedges brand is also innovating via AI content and AI models.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy A17 5G With 50MP Camera And Galaxy AI Launched In India: Price, Specs
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced its new A-series phone. The phone is being launched for buyers in the Indian market.

articles.title: "I'm going to bed now," the customer says, and the lights in the house slowly turn off, the curtains..
articles.author: Kim Dong Eun
articles.summary: LG Electronics will introduce the LG ThinQon, an AI-based smart home hub, and nine new LG IoT devices at IFA 2025 in Berlin. The LG ThinQon uses Generative AI to learn user patterns and control connected devices, while the new IoT devices include smart door locks, sensors, and controllers that can be managed through the ThinQ app.

articles.title: Hyundai Australia moves to seven-year warranty, with a catch
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: MG, Mitsubishi, and Nissan have introduced a 10-year warranty for their vehicles. Like Hyundai, the warranty is conditional on servicing being conducted at official workshops.

articles.title: Sweet, Nostalgic Snack Time
articles.author: Family Features
articles.summary: Wonder bread is launching a new line of sweet snacks under the Wonder Treats brand. The new line includes Powdered Mini Donuts, Creme Filled Chocolate Cupcakes, and Glazed Honey Buns. These products are available at grocery stores nationwide and offer a nostalgic yet modern take on convenience and indulgence.

articles.title: Naver partners with Kurly to enhance early morning fresh food delivery in Korea
articles.author: Shim Min-Gwan
articles.summary: Naver, in collaboration with Kurly, has launched a full-fledged early morning delivery service including fresh produce. This expands Naver's existing early morning delivery service, leveraging Kurly's cold chain infrastructure to cover 80% of the metropolitan area and includes same-day delivery to Jeju. Naver plans to further expand this service to include daily necessities and room-temperature/low-temperature foods.

articles.title: 全新一代博越沈阳上市交付活动火爆启幕，7.89万起享越级家用体验_手机网易网
articles.author: 沈阳日报乐享沈阳
articles.summary: Geely Automobile launched its new generation Boyue SUV at the Wanda Plaza in Shenyang on August 30th. The SUV, positioned as a 100,000-level family SUV, is priced between 78,900 and 99,900 yuan and includes a range of advanced features. The first batch of car owners received their vehicles at the event.

articles.title: OnePlus Turbo tipped to launch as affordable performance-focused phone
articles.author: Anvinraj Valiyathara
articles.summary: OnePlus is expected to launch the OnePlus 15, the OnePlus Ace 6, and a new Turbo series in China. The Turbo series will be a more affordable lineup, focusing on performance in the budget segment and competing with the Redmi series. The OnePlus 15 will feature the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 and will be available in multiple configurations and colors.

articles.title: Amazon will sell you the iPhone 16 Pro for $250 off right now - how ...
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Apple is preparing for the iPhone 17 launch event. Current-generation iPhone models are being offered at significantly reduced prices before the launch.

articles.title: My go-to wet floor cleaner from Dyson just got a $200 price cut for Labor Day
articles.author: Ruth Hamilton
articles.summary: Dyson is offering a discount on its WashG1 wet floor cleaner. The WashG1 is available for $549 (originally $749.99) at Dyson and Amazon.com.

articles.title: Dyson V8 vs V15 Detect cordless vacuum: what's the difference and which should I buy?
articles.author: Ruth Hamilton
articles.summary: Dyson launched the V8 vacuum in 2016 and the V15 Detect in 2021. The V8 is a basic, affordable option, while the V15 Detect features automatic suction adjustment and a laser-equipped cleaner head, catering to larger homes and more challenging cleaning needs.

articles.title: GP Batteries Partners with GPTBots to Build a Global Intelligent Customer Service Network
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: GP Batteries partnered with GPTBots.ai to launch an AI-powered customer service system, named 'Battery Advisor' and 'Global Customer Service Ambassador'. The system provides battery model recommendations, FAQs, and location guidance. This has reduced customer service workload by over 50% and improved customer satisfaction by enabling 24/7 automated responses and reducing operating costs.

articles.title: Yingli Solar Sets New Quality Benchmark for High-Performance PV Modules
articles.summary: Yingli Solar has set a new quality benchmark for its high-performance PV modules.

articles.title: NAVER Cloud announced on the 1st that it has successfully completed "AI Fortenday," an AI (artificia..
articles.author: A Prescription
articles.summary: NAVER Cloud hosted an AI hackathon, 'AI Fortenday', based on Hyperclova X. The winning service, 'LundLeader,' provides AI laundry guides by analyzing clothing labels and photos using Hyperclova X Vision. 'Moyage' developed an AI survey tool, demonstrating the use of Hyperclova X to solve real-life problems.

articles.title: 33 Cheerful Products That Are As Close To Buying Happiness As You Can Get
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: NYX introduced the "Smushy" Matte Lip Balm, featuring mochi rice powder and available in flavors like cherry pie and raspberry sorbet. Kuumba Made released a Creamy Coconut fragrance rollerball, a beachy scent known for its longevity. Eos launched a limited edition Marshmallow "Super Balm" lip treatment, which is claimed to be better than existing products.

articles.title: 机器人：公司近期新发布了新松智能类人双臂平台、'松羿'轮式人形机器人等产品_手机网易网
articles.author: 每日经济新闻
articles.summary: Robot (300024.SZ) recently launched several new products: the New Song Intelligent Humanoid Bipedal Platform, the Song Yi Wheeled Humanoid Robot, and the Song Xing Bipedal Humanoid Robot. These products are currently in the demonstration and promotion phase.

articles.title: LG BRINGS SEAMLESS, EVOLVING SMART HOME EXPERIENCES TO EUROPE WITH THINQ AI
org: LG Electronics Home Appliance Solution Company
articles.summary: LG Electronics is launching its new AI platform, LG ThinQ AI, in the European smart home appliance market. This platform integrates ThinQ UP and ThinQ Care services to deliver continuous upgrades and proactive maintenance for appliances. The platform also includes features focused on energy efficiency and ease of use, such as Energy Saving Mode for washing machines and AI Saving Mode for refrigerators.

articles.title: Nongshim announced on the 1st that it will introduce a cup noodle called 'Shrimp Tang Large Bowl Noo..
articles.author: Lee Hyo-Seok
articles.summary: Nongshim is launching 'Shrimp Tang Large Bowl Noodle' as a cup noodle, based on the popularity of a limited-edition version released earlier. The new product contains dried shrimp, fish, dried seaweed, carrots, and pepper powder. The official release is scheduled for the 15th in response to consumer demand.

articles.title: Natural Nine to Launch Feminine Cleanser in the First Half of Next Year, Targeting Overseas Consumers
articles.summary: Natural Nine, a Korean body care brand, will launch a feminine wash in the first half of next year and plans to expand into overseas markets including Singapore. The new product will be formulated with herbal ingredients sourced from Korea and tailored specifically for Asian skin types.

articles.title: LG Brings Seamless, Evolving Smart Home Experiences to Europe With ThinQ AI (LG Corp)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: LG Electronics is launching its new AI platform, LG ThinQ AI, in the European smart home appliance market. LG ThinQ AI integrates the ThinQ UP and ThinQ Care services.

articles.title: Sweet, Nostalgic Snack Time
articles.summary: Wonder bread is launching a new line of sweet snacks called 'Wonder Treats'. The new product line features items like Powdered Mini Donuts, Creme Filled Chocolate Cupcakes, and Glazed Honey Buns, which are now available at grocery stores nationwide.

articles.title: Best Dyson stick vacuums for lightweight and cordless convenience
articles.author: Daily Press
articles.summary: Dyson offers innovative, high-quality stick vacuums. These lightweight, cordless vacuums are designed for convenient cleaning on hard floors, rugs, and carpets.

articles.title: JONR to Debut Annual Flagship Robot Vacuum X1 Max at IFA 2025
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: JONR will launch its annual flagship robot vacuum, the X1 Max, at IFA 2025 in Berlin. The X1 Max is designed to deliver professional-grade performance at an accessible price and will be rolled out across key markets in Europe.

articles.title: बीजी ग्रुपद्वारा कुलप्याड स्मार्टफोन सार्वजनिक
articles.author: कान्तिपुर संवाददाता
articles.summary: BG Group has launched Coolpad X100, featuring a triple camera and 120Hz ultra-smooth display, along with Coolpad C16, Coolpad C15, and Coolpad C12 in the Nepali market. These new Coolpad models are now available in major mobile stores across the country.
